00034 #define ADD_FUSE_OPT(p) \
00035         if (fuse_opt_add_arg(&args, p)) { \
00036                 fprintf(stderr, "Can't add %s to the list of options, aborting!\n",p); \
00037                 return 1; \
00038         }
00039 
00040 static void print_usage()
00041 {
00042         fprintf(stderr,
00043         "HybFS\n"
00044         "Usage: hybfs directory mountpoint\n"
00045         "general options: (you don't have any choice here)\n"
00046         "    -h   --help            print help\n");
00047 }
00048 
00049 int hybfs_opts(void *data, const char *arg, int key,
00050                 struct fuse_args *outargs)
00051 {
00052         HybfsData *hybfs_core = (HybfsData *) data;
00053         
00054         int res = 0;
00055         
00056         DBG_PRINT("arguments: %s\n", arg);
00057 
00058         switch (key)
00059         {
00060         case FUSE_OPT_KEY_NONOPT:
00061                 res = hybfs_core->parse_branches(arg);
00062                 if (res > 0)
00063                         return 0;
00064                 hybfs_core->retval = 1;
00065                 return 1;
00066         case KEY_HELP:
00067                 print_usage();
00068                 fuse_opt_add_arg(outargs, "-ho");
00069                 hybfs_core->doexit = 1;
00070                 return 0;
00071         default:
00072                 hybfs_core->retval = 1;
00073                 return 1;
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 #define INIT_KEY(index, string, key) \
00078         options[index].templ = string; \
00079         options[index].offset = -1U; \
00080         options[index].value = key; \
00081 
00082 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00083 {
00084         int i;
00085         int res, exit, retval;
00086         struct fuse_args args;
00087         static struct fuse_opt options[3];
00088         static struct fuse_operations hybfs_oper;
00089         
00090         HybfsData *data = new HybfsData(NULL);
00091         
00092         args.argc = argc;
00093         args.argv = argv;
00094         args.allocated = 0;
00095         
00096         hybfs_oper.getattr = hybfs_getattr;
00097         hybfs_oper.access = hybfs_access;
00098         hybfs_oper.readdir = hybfs_readdir;
00099         hybfs_oper.unlink = hybfs_unlink;
00100         hybfs_oper.rename = hybfs_rename;
00101         
00102         INIT_KEY(0,"--help", KEY_HELP);
00103         INIT_KEY(1,"-h", KEY_HELP);
00104         INIT_KEY(2,NULL,0);
00105 
00106 #ifdef DBG
00107         for(i=0; i<argc; i++)
00108         printf("%s : ", argv[i]);
00109         printf("hybfs: end argument list\n");
00110 #endif
00111 
00112         if (fuse_opt_parse(&args, data, options, hybfs_opts) == -1) {
00113                 
00114                 delete data;
00115                 return 1;
00116         }
00117         /* set additional options for fuse */
00118         if (getuid() == 0 || getgid() == 0) {
00119                 ADD_FUSE_OPT("-odefault_permissions");
00120         }
00121         ADD_FUSE_OPT("-ononempty");
00122 
00123         res = data->start_db_storage();
00124         if(res != 0) {
00125                 delete data;
00126                 return 1;
00127         }
00128         
00129         umask(0);
00130         /* pass the data to each context from now on */
00131         res = fuse_main(args.argc, args.argv, &hybfs_oper, data);
00132         
00133         retval = data->retval;
00134         exit = data->doexit;
00135         
00136         if(data)
00137                 delete data;
00138         
00139         return exit ? retval : res;
00140 }
